Codes

Here, you’ll find a collection of coding projects that I’ve developed throughout my career, spanning various domains including machine learning, data analysis, and physics, as well as some other projects that I have done for fun.


  • Root_with_Python

    Collection of scripts that combine Python and ROOT for data analysis. The folder TMVA contains a Machine-Learning tool based on the TMVA library.

  • XGBoost_tHq

    Collection of Python scripts to train, optimise and inject a Boosted Decision Tree using the XGBoost library.

  • InDetAlignmentWebMonitor

    Package for Web App for the online monitoring of the ATLAS Inner Detector alignment.

  • PhD_Thesis

    LaTeX files for the PhD thesis “Search for the Higgs boson produced in association with a top quark using τ leptons with ATLAS”.

  • MSc_Thesis

    LaTeX files for the master thesis “Optimisation of selection criteria of t-channel single-top-quark events at √s= 13 TeV for studies of anomalous couplings in the Wtb vertex”.

  • DeepLearning_intro

    Completed exercises from the Udacity course Intro to Deep Learning with PyTorch.

  • MonkeyJump

    Game based on the pygame framework and inspired by the Dinosaur Game built into the Google Chrome web browser. Later a reinforcement learning algorithm learns to play it in the project Learn_MonkeyJump.

  • Blackjack_RL

    Implementation of a single agent reinforced learning algorithm based on Gymnasium’s pygame environment. The Q-agent learns to play the popular game of BlackJack.

  • GenAI_ImgCaptioner

    Tools to perform automatic image captioning. Based on PyTorch’s torchvision and HuggingFace’s BLIP. The web interfaces are obtained using Gradio.

  • GenAI_ChatBot

    Chatbot with Open Source LLMs using Python and Hugging Face. blenderbot. Flask is used for hosting the backend service.

  • GenAI_VoiceAssistant

    Voice Assistant with Open AI’s GPT-3 and IBM Watson embeddable AI. Flask is used for hosting the backend service.

  • GenAI_MeetingCompanion

    Application to transcribe discussions and provides a concise summary of a meeting. OpenAI’s Whisper is used to for STT and IBM Watson’s AI to summarize and find key points. Interfaced with Gradio.

  • GenAI_SummariseData

    Chatbot to read a pdf document and answer questions about it using Llama2 LLM. The LangChain framework is used to integrate the RAG.

  • NBA_Stats

    Web scraping tool to retrieve information from the ESPN webpage and perform analysis.

  • github.io

    This website that you are seeing right now. It is based on the Jekyll-Uno.

  • NLP_WebApp

    Watson NLP Sentiment Analysis web app with Flask.

  • OnlineCourseApp

    Online Course App developed with Django.
